Reviews.Title: good little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: V. DeBruin
Reviews.Content: I like to keep a camera in my purse for times when you're out and about and something cute happens! I've always loved the Panasonic Lumix so I thought I'd try this little inexpensive one to replace my SD card Lumix (the download times were killing me without SDHC). This is a great little camera. It's much better than cell phone cameras. The download speed is great. Pictures are good. The shutter speed is a noticeably slower indoors than my SLR, but hey, this is a point and shoot. It had many settings you can pick from and some neat functions-I haven't played with them all yet. The video quality is really good (better than my video camera). However, video IS a memory hog (the camera says my empty 4GB card will hold 4 minutes of video). But hey, for a quick little camera-it does really good. I'm still very impressed by Panasonic and they are my top choice. Couldn't beat Amazon's price either. LOVE the colors!!!

Reviews.Title: Nothing but Panasonic
Reviews.Author: C. Reich
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth or fifth Panasonic camera or video recorder of some kind. I got this one for my 11 year old daughter. With a small amount of instruction she was able to use most of the features like a pro. My ONLY, ONLY, ONLY complaint about Panasonic is the battery issue. EVERY SINGLE STINKING Panasonic camera has a DIFFERENT battery. They can vary by .01 inches and 1 amp, but they can not be used across multiple platforms. Otherwise, Panasonic cameras take great pictures and are easy to use. I have one that is 6 years old and I have drug it all over the world. It still works great.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Kathryn R. Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for everyday use. Very easy to use and takes great pictures! I can't say anything negative unless you are looking to take pictures from a great distance. Then you would need more optical, like 15X. Otherwise, this is a great item! Movie mode is also very good for a camera of this size. Also, nice and thin to fit in your pocket! Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: PANASONIC LUMIX DMC-FH1 12.1 MP DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: METHA L WEBER
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE SIMPLICITY YET WITH FEATURES, AND I DON'T HAVE TO KNOW HOW TO DO ANYTHING BUT POINT AND I CAN BUY REPLACEMENT PARTS FROM PANASONIC EASILY.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious
Reviews.Content: I love taking pictures, but I didn't want to spend a fortune on a new camera. This one looked nice and had great features, for the low price. I love the scene modes you can pick from, and the wide-angle lens. Such a great purchase! After ordering, it got to me in a timely manor and had no defects! I am very impressed with the quality of pictures and the trustworthiness of Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: I got it for my wife and she loves it. I would use it more, but I am not man enough to use a bright pink camera. It takes great pics, the included battery lasts a long time and it is small enough to take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Not Clear Pictures
Reviews.Author: Twinkletoes
Reviews.Content: I got the camera and everything appears really retouched and smeary. Taking a picture of your face is not clear just smeary. You couldn't see your pores or any definition on your face. Flash on the face is over exposed. Really blurry. Don't Buy. I researched on here for a good panasonic camera that is small. I chose this one and am extremely disappointed. My DMC-FZ8 I've had for 3 years is the Best Camera I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: returned for repairs in first month of use
Reviews.Author: VK
Reviews.Content: not really able to review this camera as the lens cover stopped opening within a few weeks - camera has been returned for repairs, as it was over the return date by the time I gave it as a gift.  Very disappointing - still no camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Earl Lesch "pcsheepman"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera a gift. I had considered buying a Lumix before having always had NikonDigital cameras previously. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of photos.I am not sure about the video mode being hand held and giving smooth videos though.The videos are quite choppy but that may be my problem. When used on a tripod, the videos aregreat. The pictures are good and the color balance is also very good. For a small pocket  camerathis camera works very well.

Reviews.Title: Lumix Panasonic wonderful camera absolutely
Reviews.Author: C. Landauer
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe how well this camera works.  I had been using an old 4 pixel digitial bought for me some years back, but this camera is amazing.You can choose how big a photo you want to take/ for email / for 11x14 enlargements etc.  Its so lightweight and also had wide angle on it, and I cannot imagine how incredible the other Lumix is, if this one is so great..It takes photos of my artwork wonderfully, even with glass when you stand a bit to the side..WOW !!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Headhunter
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product, I am very satisfied with the purchase you make. My girlfriend is very happy with this camera. 100% Recommended..

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Holly Venables "Hols"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I had been looking for a cheap (under 100 bucks) pocket camera.  While I usually use my Nikon D80 for the special photos, it's too bulky and expensive to carry around, and it doesn't take video.  I'm so happy I bought the Lumix DMC-FH1 as a backup everyday camera.  The quality of the HD video is amazing!  Now when my baby does something cute I have it right there and I don't miss a thing.  The widescreen photos are also nice, as well as the "soft skin" scene mode for those wrinkles - better than botox.

Reviews.Title: can not take clear photos
Reviews.Author: W. Hu "turtle lover"
Reviews.Content: I dont' know if this is a defective camera. I took several hundreds of photos, both indoor and outdoor. None of them is clear. I was so dissapointed. I have to return it. The good part is the HD video is good. The speed is fast. You can take next photo immediately.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix Pink Camera
Reviews.Author: Brittaney Helman
Reviews.Content: I loooove this camera. It takes very nice clear pictures, and doesnt have a long delay or bright flash while taking picture.  Its just right in size, its small and light weight. I can put this camera in a small case and just throw it in my purse. I for sure give this camera a 5 star. :)

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Crafter Girl "Crafter Girl"
Reviews.Content: LOVE my new camera!  Great price, speedy delivery, LOVE the pink!  It's everything I expected and then some!  Thank you - GREAT doing business with you!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH1
Reviews.Author: Gridsada Phanomchoeng
Reviews.Content: For the camera that is less than $100, this camera is good. However, if your budget is more than $120, you can get the better camera.Pros: Overalls are good.Cons: The frame seems not strong. The camera mode is normal. Don't have beauty mode.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic FH1
Reviews.Author: Mike Meier "farmer64"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this hot pink camera for my wife. She loves it. Easy to use, carry and looks great. A great pocket camera, great pictures. I even put up with the comments of the cute pink camera when I use it.

Reviews.Title: Not a perfect handbag camera
Reviews.Author: llad00w
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife to keep in her handbag.  The size is great for that, and she loved the pink color.  However, the on/off switch is too easily moved and so the camera is always turning on in her bag.  The main problem is that it extends the lens and opens the built-in lens cover.  So then the exposed lens is hitting against other things in her bag and getting filled with lint.I'm not impressed with the low light capability and the flash is pretty weak, but it is by far the smallest camera I've owned.  I've not compared to other cameras of the same size.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1-megapixel effective recording
5X optical zoom
2-11/16" LCD screen
Optical image stabilization
Wide-angle lens for shooting landscapes and large groups
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH1 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Pink)
